titles.title: You Shall Go Out With Joy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You shall go out with joy
And be led forth with peace.
The mountains and the hills
Shall break forth with singing.
There'll be shouts of joy,
And all the trees of the field
Will clap, will clap their hands.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The trees of the field will clap their hands.
The trees of the field will clap their hands.
The trees of the field will clap their hands
As you go out with joy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Con gozo tu saldras seras llevado en paz,
Los montes y collados brotan ante ti,
Gritaran con gozo y los arboles,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Del campo palmearan,
Los arboles del campo palmearan (3x)
Al salir con regocijo
